name: Leaden Sky: Nightmares
description:
Leaden Sky: Nightmares is a single player, FPS horror game, it features early 2000s era graphics and is inspired by popular horror games of that time.

GAMEPLAY:

Leaden Sky: Nightmares is a horror game with exciting combat system, featuring precise collision for melee weapon (axe) which hits exactly there you swing during attack, on top of that character movement includes ability to quickly dodge and hit back, creating very responsive and intensive encounters.

Firearms feature procedural recoil system which realistically simulates spread and allows bullets to land exactly where the barrel is aiming, creating more challenge for the player.

Enemy AI is aggresive, challenging and unpredictable, resulting in unique encounters each time. Thanks to dynamic patrolling system you will often see enemies in unexpected areas, this creates an unique horror experience without jumpscares!

STORY:

The story revolves around half-polish US veteran - Kyle Anderson, who resigned army to seek for peaceful life as power plant security guard in Poland. For few years his life was going great, until certain energy company has offered experimental technology to Polish gonverment. Said technology is inspired by one of Tesla's prototypes and required modification of already existing coal based power plants.

This change gets him increasingly paranoid every day and worried about future consequences of those experimental modifications, especially the antennas built into chimney, which he observes every day from a hill in forest nearby his house.

As the time passes Kyle starts noticing strange electrical phenomena in his workplace and hearing strange stories from people living in the city.
One day he witnessed something terrifying and starts experiencing nightmares...
